```{r}
num=0
get_integer_cols<-function(df){
  for(i in 1:ncol(df)) {
    #print(colnames(df[i]))
    if(sapply(df[i],class)=="integer" || sapply(df[i],class)=="numeric"){
      num=num+1
      print(paste("col",i,":",colnames(df[i])))
    }
  }
  print(paste("num:",num))
  print(paste("num cols not integer or numeric:",ncol(birth)-num))
}
get_integer_cols(birth)
```
